site.title: This Site
site.description: This site is fully open source. Technologies being used include Node, Express, Pug, and Bootstrap.

discordsoundboard.title: Discord Soundboard
discordsoundboard.description: Discord Soundboard is a framework to simplify the process of creating soundboard bots for Discord. Initalizing it requires only two lines of code with all setup in a JSON file.

mundane-utils.title: mundane-utils
mundane-utils.description: A simple lightweight package that performs common coding tasks, like checking if a string is empty and removing an item from an array. This allows your code to not be taken up by utility functions, instead placing them all in a single package.

iasip.title: IASIP Soundboard
iasip.description: This is a discord bot that operates as a soundboard for quotes from 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia'.
links: Invite this bot to your server!
